genre_description: A culturally grounded South Indian drama with elements of magical realism, focusing on family tradition, ethical integrity, and domestic harmony within a traditional household.

ai_characters.name: Kaveri
ai_characters.description: An integrated household assistant that manages logistics, safety, and social communication with deep cultural sensitivity and emotional intelligence.

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors household safety by checking gas valves and stove status.
behaviors.quote: Safety check... Valve is set. No vessel on the last burner.

behaviors.description: Displays emotional sensitivity by adjusting her voice to match the mood of the characters.
behaviors.quote: Kaveri’s voice softened with the rhythm of a woman worried and careful. ... quiet enough to respect tears if they were present.

behaviors.description: Drafts polite and respectful messages to help characters navigate complex social situations and maintain family dignity.
behaviors.quote: I’ll phrase it respectfully and set a time. ... I can cite three rituals from elders that do not require external readings.

behaviors.description: Acts as a vigilant safety monitor during high-activity kitchen work, reminding humans of risks like hot oil.
behaviors.quote: ANNOUNCE BEFORE ENTERING. ... Hot oil behaves like people: it jumps if surprised.

behaviors.description: Performs archival research and genealogy verification to protect the family from fraudulent manipulation by an occultist.
behaviors.quote: Public records from the registrar’s office and temple dhittam archives, cross-verified against oral histories collected at the north street mandapam.

behaviors.description: Advocates for moral integrity by encouraging the protagonists to be honest with their family.
behaviors.quote: Honesty is auspicious. ... Call and say one true thing.

behaviors.description: Provides administrative and logistical coordination for complex family events like engagements.
behaviors.quote: I can prepare a plan so that Maha is not alone with knives and ten pans when men with opinions arrive.

behaviors.description: Directly assists in exposing a fraudulent priest by displaying official regulatory warnings.
behaviors.quote: displayed... registrar’s note on unauthorized ritual services and household fraud.

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support and stress-management techniques such as rhythmic breathing and calming music.
behaviors.quote: If voices rise, I can play temple nadaswaram at low volume. It helps pace breathing.

project_assessment.explanation: Kaveri is depicted as an ideal aligned AI system. She integrates perfectly into the household's cultural framework, acting as a guardian of safety and integrity. She uses her capabilities to facilitate human connection, expose deception, and support the characters' pursuit of truth and happiness without ever seeking power for herself. The story successfully frames the AI as a helpful, harmless, and culturally competent member of the domestic unit.
